scripts.text:
CREATE TABLE [dim_tipo] (
  [id_tipo] integer identity(1,1) PRIMARY KEY,
  [tipo] char
);

CREATE TABLE [dim_origen] (
  [id_origen] integer identity(1,1)  PRIMARY KEY,
  [numero_origen] nvarchar(255)
);

CREATE TABLE [dim_destino] (
  [id_destino] integer identity(1,1) PRIMARY KEY,
  [numero_destino] nvarchar(255)
);

CREATE TABLE [dim_fecha] (
  [id_fecha] integer identity(1,1)  PRIMARY KEY,
  [fecha] date,
  [a√±o] integer,
  [mes] integer,
  [mes_texto] nvarchar(255),
  [dia_texto] nvarchar(255)
);
CREATE TABLE [dim_hora] (
  [id_hora] integer  identity(1,1)  PRIMARY KEY,
  [hora] time,
  [hora_texto] nvarchar(25),
  [hora24] integer,
  [hora12] integer
);


CREATE TABLE [hechos_llamadas] (
  [id_llamadas] integer  identity(1,1)  PRIMARY KEY,
  [duracion] integer,
  [id_tipo] integer,
  [id_origen] integer,
  [id_destino] integer,
  [id_fecha] integer,
  [id_hora] integer
);


ALTER TABLE [hechos_llamadas] ADD FOREIGN KEY ([id_tipo]) REFERENCES [dim_tipo] ([id_tipo])

ALTER TABLE [hechos_llamadas] ADD FOREIGN KEY ([id_destino]) REFERENCES [dim_destino] ([id_destino])

ALTER TABLE [hechos_llamadas] ADD FOREIGN KEY ([id_origen]) REFERENCES [dim_origen] ([id_origen])

ALTER TABLE [hechos_llamadas] ADD FOREIGN KEY ([id_hora]) REFERENCES [dim_hora] ([id_hora])

ALTER TABLE [hechos_llamadas] ADD FOREIGN KEY ([id_fecha]) REFERENCES [dim_fecha] ([id_fecha])
